#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>

using namespace std;

bool prime[100001];

void isPrime(){
for(int i=0;i<=100000;++i){
    prime[i] = true;
}
prime[0] = false;
prime[1] = false;
int m = sqrt(100000);
for(int i=0;i<=m;++i){
    if(prime[i]){
        for(int j=i*i;j<=100000;j+=i){
            prime[j] = false;
        }
    }
}
}


int main(){
int i,t,x,y,n,cnt,j,m,flag,k;
cnt=0;
j=0;
isPrime();
int A[5133];
for(i=0;i<=50000;++i){
    if(prime[i]){
        A[j] = i;
        //cout<<A[j]<<" ";
        j++;
    }
}
//if(prime[3001]) cout<<2499;
int B[100001];
B[2] = 1;
for(i=3;i<=100000;++i){
    B[i] = 0;
    j=0;
    flag =0;
    k = i;
    while(flag!=1){
    if(prime[k]){
        B[i]++;
        //cout<<B[i]<<" ";
        flag = 1;
        continue;
    }
    //j=0;
    while(A[j]<=k && j<5133){
        if(k%A[j] == 0){
            B[i]++;
            while(k%A[j] == 0){
            //B[i]++;
            k = k/A[j];
            }
            j++;
            if(k==1) flag =1;
        break;
        }
        j++;
    }

    }
    //Scout<<B[i]<<" ";

}
//cout<<B[92820];

cin>>t;
while(t--){
        cnt=0;
    cin>>x>>y>>n;
    for(i=x;i<=y;++i){
        if(B[i] == n){
            cnt++;
        }
    }
    cout<<cnt<<endl;
}

return 0;
}
